pkgmetadata.longdescription: Testing Two-Sample Mean in High Dimension // Implements the high- dimensional two-sample test proposed by Zhang (2019) http://hdl.handle.net/2097/40235. It also implements the test proposed by Srivastava, Katayama, and Kano (2013) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2012.08.014. These tests are particularly suitable to high dimensional data from two populations for which the classical multivariate Hotelling's T-square test fails due to sample sizes smaller than dimensionality. In this case, the ZWL and ZWLm tests proposed by Zhang (2019) http://hdl.handle.net/2097/40235, referred to as zwl_test() in this package, provide a reliable and powerful test.
